thread.title: Colton Haynes just pushed his fiancee into a swimming pool
thread.title_full: Colton Haynes just pushed his fiancee into a swimming pool

author: David Grant
title: Colton Haynes just pushed his fiancee into a swimming pool
text:
Colton Haynes and his florist fiancee Jeff Leatham celebrated their recent engagement throughout the weekend, and it’s all quite insultingly adorable. 
Related: Colton Haynes is now engaged. Oh, and Cher helped. 
Naturally, much of their celebration was posted to Instagram in real time, such as this Dynasty -esque moment in which Haynes hurdles Leatham into a pool. 
Leatham captioned the moment: “Sabotaged by #TeamLeatham and my LOVE @coltonlhaynes – forgiven BUT they are next” Sabotaged by #TeamLeatham and my LOVE ?? @coltonlhaynes – lol ???- forgiven BUT they are next – A post shared by JeffLeatham (@jeffleatham) on Mar 19, 2017 at 1:33pm PDT 

“An absolutely beautiful celebration for our loving journey ahead,” Haynes wrote. “Thx to all of our friends &a family for sharing your love with us.” An absolutely beautiful celebration for our loving journey ahead @jeffleatham . Thx to all of our friends &a family for sharing your love with us A post shared by Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) on Mar 19, 2017 at 12:27pm PDT 
Overwhelmed by all of the love & support y'all have been sending @jeffleatham & I on our engagement. The fact that so many people love love as much as we do is truly inspiring and I feel so humbled. Who woulda thought that a lil ole kansas boy would meet a country boy from Utah & embark on journey that truly feels like one in the movies? I wish the same for everyone out there. No matter who you love…don't be afraid to love hard :) #whatmoviesaremadeof #LoveWins A post shared by Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) on Mar 13, 2017 at 6:56am PDT 
I SAID YES!!! ???? @jeffleatham A post shared by Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) on Mar 12, 2017 at 11:04am PDT
